item.description:
6:30-8:30
$5 Facilitated Discussion
Held downstairs in Mama Iguana's private Party Room

In the ever changing field of Search Engine Optimization we like to have periodic facilitated round table discussion to pool and update our knowledge in a variety of strategies for increasing website traffic and strengthening the online presence of our clients.

Bring your SEO questions and experience!

Marketing and SEO has become an essential component of building a website and sometimes an after
thought or considered a specialized area of knowledge.

However, we can break it down into a variety of components and moniter the latest
strategy in each area.
For example to name a few:
Meta Tags
Html code and image tags, page titles
Social Media: and favorite plug ins or modules
Brief review of Google Analytics
online industry specific listings
Wordpress plugins
drupal modules
google tools for web developer
link sharing
Others

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday evening: SEO (search Engine Optimization) Discussion Group
